rows.label: tev000791_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0002
rows.name:
This is your dog, right? Man, what a good boy.
He was just letting me give him some lovin'.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000791_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Doug what he means by "give him some lovin'."

rows.label: tev000791_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: tev000791_SEL0021
rows.name: Make sure your dog isn't being a pest.

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Er, you know! Pets and stuff?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0004
rows.name:
I scratch under his chin, rub his belly, make his leg do
that kicking thing... You know! Lovin'![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0005
rows.name: Okay, seriously? Why are you giving me that look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0006
rows.name:
When I pass a dog that needs lovin',
I'm not gonna leave him hanging![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0007
rows.name: Huh? Oh, no no no! No, nothing like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0008
rows.name:
Unlike real mutts, these dogs have been designed to
never attack people, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0009
rows.name:
Or were you worried that he was forcing me to pet
him until my arm fell off? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_JNK0110
rows.name: Comment

rows.label: tev000791_SEL0111
rows.name: Mention how Doug sure seems to love dogs.

rows.label: tev000791_JNK0120
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000791_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Doug if he has any pets of his own.

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yeah, I can't say I ever used to be a huge dog person
or anything. But pets are just so rare on Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0011
rows.name:
I guess having pets around makes it feel like we're
back on Earth. At least a little bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0012
rows.name: They put me in a...nostalgic sort of mood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0013
rows.name:
Makes me think back to a time when my parents and
brothers and I would play with our pets in the
backyard without a care in the world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0014
rows.name:
Eh, but I'm not really the sentimental type.
I know brooding about Earth is Lao's thing,
and I don't want to step on his turf.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0015
rows.name:
But I guess there's a part of me that longs for Earth
all the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0016
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0017
rows.name:
All right, that's enough wallowing in homesickness.
I've got missions to complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0018
rows.name:
But if you ever get a line on a job with a big payoff,
hook me up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0019
rows.name: Nah, I don't have any myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0020
rows.name:
I don't have the time or the money.
Or heck, even the patience![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0021
rows.name:
If I ever find myself with a little extra lovin' to give,
I'll just invite myself over to play with your pooch.
That's more than enough for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0022
rows.name: Er, sorry if that seems a little selfish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0023
rows.name: Well, I've had my fill. Better get back to work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000791_MSG0024
rows.name:
But if you ever get a line on an assignment with a big
payoff, hook me up![ST:wait ]
